channel.title: 🏢 the Ohio State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 the Ohio State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Grokking of Implicit Reasoning in Transformers: A Mechanistic Journey to the Edge of Generalization
item.description: Transformers can learn implicit reasoning through ‘grokking’, achieving high accuracy in composition and comparison tasks; however, generalization varies across reasoning types.
